attributes.title: Not happy ☹️
attributes.review: I am truly appalled by the unreliability of this app. I log onto it and immediately am BOMBARDED by several disturbing and disrespectful thoughts of things I should do. 👎Now me being the melonin full light skin that I am had never ever thought of the black lives movement as Terrorism but TODAY I DID. The app truly brainwashed me and made my entire life flip upside down.😾 DO NOT RECOMMEND

attributes.title: terrible app, terrible campaign! 😻
attributes.review:
trump’s a racist, homophobic, and mindless fascist. anything that supports a continuation in his presidency deserves nothing more than a one-star rating.
 black lives matter as well as hispanic lives, so any campaign not willing to understand the basic human rights of these people should NOT be running the country. 

bring back tiktok and save barron, bye ❤️🥱

attributes.title: Worst app ever!!
attributes.review:
This app took forever to download it took about 2 hours download and then it took up a lot of storage on my phone and when I tried going on the app it kept kicking me out. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!! 
This app is really hard to navigate and it takes up a lot of storage so don’t download it. Pleasure doing business with you.

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: I put in the wrong phone number and it didn’t send to my phone!!!!! I am outraged with this. I am NOT even done yet. When I downloaded the app, my phone exploded and burned down my house. Thankfully I am okay with just losing eight limbs and my sense of smell, taste, eyesight, hearing, and movement in my body. Overall, this app is absolute garbage and fake news.

attributes.userName: i might just go crazy ay
attributes.title: The worst
attributes.review: So when i got this app I was literally sitting on my couch and as I was sitting there going through this horrible app it started to glitch and as it was glitching the app kicked me out so I turned my phone off and went back to the app. The news looked very “fake news” as trump says. I had high hopes I really did:(

attributes.title: Disappointed but not surprised... 😔
attributes.review: I came here to check out the app, I downloaded it and I can see why people dislike it so much. I agree with everyone who has reviewed it and gave it one star. Extremely disappointed, try again with a better system. This is the worst by far! 😔😔

attributes.title: Annoying orange
attributes.review: I was expecting so much, I download this to keep up with our “incredible” president and when I open the app I was so disappointed it kept making my phone slow and popping so many ads and also the content on it was not to me standards would not recommend!!

attributes.title: Go Trump !
attributes.review: This app is absolutely amazing. It works perfectly. I wouldn’t change a thing about it! This app is the best app on the App Store right now! Trump 2020!!!

attributes.title: Terrible App
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to expand my political ideas. Sadly I never got the chance because the app did not let me use it for two minutes without crashing. The few moments I did get to use it, all I saw was articles about Trumps fascist ideas. Will not be downloading ever again. Do not get this app!

attributes.title: ✨bad vibes✨
attributes.review: This app is really disgusting after a couple day that I had it I tried going on here again but my eyes started to hurt really bad they burned sooooo much I don’t recommend thus app the ✨president✨ is so uneducated Hispanic and black live matter it would be really helpful if you didn’t get this app I almost died from using it✨☺️
